title: 820-00840 distorted image
message:
Board got liquid damage on U7220, R8400, U8210, U8400.

It turns on but image is distorted - I can see log in screen.
R7226 and C10CA was not looking great. So replace that with U7220 just in case.

Issue is still the same.

Changed LVDS and tested with known good display and same issue.
Tested J8500 with EDP Meter and all readings are correct.

Any idea where to start?

title: 820-00840 distorted image
message:
Then you have problems with CPU (iGPU), or RAM.
Distorted image even on boot menu?

title: 820-00840 distorted image
message:
Yes, on boot menu as well.
Thanks anyway
